project data by grouping, and adding aggregate columns.

project data by grouping, and adding aggregate columns.

project_nse(source, groupby, ..., env = parent.frame())

Arguments

source

source to select from.
groupby

grouping columns.
...

new column assignment expressions.
env

environment to look for values in.

Value

project node.

Examples


 my_db <- DBI::dbConnect(RSQLite::SQLite(),
                         ":memory:")
 d <- dbi_copy_to(
   my_db, 'd',
   data.frame(group = c('a', 'a', 'b', 'b'),
              val = 1:4,
              stringsAsFactors = FALSE))

 op_tree <- d %.>%
   project_nse(., "group", vmax := max(val))
 cat(format(op_tree))
#> table('d') %.>%
#>  project(., vmax := max(val),
#>   g= group)
 sql <- to_sql(op_tree, my_db)
 cat(sql)
#> SELECT `group`, max ( `val` ) AS `vmax` FROM (
#>  SELECT
#>   `d`.`group`,
#>   `d`.`val`
#>  FROM
#>   `d`
#>  ) tsql_52796708873540545612_0000000000
#> GROUP BY
#>  `group`
 execute(my_db, op_tree)
#>   group vmax
#> 1     a    2
#> 2     b    4

 op_tree <- d %.>%
   project_nse(., NULL, vmax := max(val))
 cat(format(op_tree))
#> table('d') %.>%
#>  project(., vmax := max(val),
#>   g= )
 sql <- to_sql(op_tree, my_db)
 cat(sql)
#> SELECT max ( `val` ) AS `vmax` FROM (
#>  SELECT
#>   `d`.`val`
#>  FROM
#>   `d`
#>  ) tsql_98564863522039172198_0000000000
 execute(my_db, op_tree)
#>   vmax
#> 1    4

 DBI::dbDisconnect(my_db)
